tool_description: Formats citation data into proper citation strings according to specified style guidelines, ensuring consistent formatting and punctuation.

publication_type.description: Type of publication (journal, book, conference, etc.)

include_doi.description: Whether to include DOI in formatted citation

abbreviate_journal.description: Whether to use standard journal abbreviations

error_messages: Missing required fields: authors, title, year, citation_style, and publication_type are required.
Empty authors array: Provide at least one author name.
Unsupported citation style: Use one of [APA, MLA, Chicago, IEEE, Harvard, Vancouver].
Invalid publication type: Use one of [journal, book, conference, thesis, website].
Invalid DOI format: Provided DOI does not follow standard format.
Formatting failed: Unable to format citation due to incompatible field combinations.
usage: Provide structured citation data (authors, title, year, etc.) and specify citation style to generate properly formatted citation strings.

style_compliance.description: Whether the formatted citation meets style requirements

formatting_notes.description: Notes about formatting decisions or limitations
